sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease with steady steps by 2015; while China and America decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it decrease with steady steps by 2015; while China and America decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2015.
